00045 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 //
00047 // CLASS: uvm_object
00048 //
00049 // Base class for data objects. 
00050 //
00051 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 
00058 class uvm_object : public uvm_typed {
00059 public:
00060 
00061   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062   // Constructors and destructor
00063   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 
00065   uvm_object();
00066   uvm_object(const std::string& name);
00067   virtual ~uvm_object();
00068 
00069   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070   // functions relating to name
00071   //
00072   // get_full_name() returns get_name()
00073   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 
00075   virtual void set_name(const std::string& name);
00076   virtual std::string get_name() const;
00077   virtual std::string get_full_name() const;
00078  
00079   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080   // print, pack, unpack, copy, compare
00081   //
00082   // uvm_object methods that call the corresponding required overrides 
00083   // do_print(), do_pack(), do_unpack(), do_copy(), and do_compare()
00084   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 
00086   virtual void print(std::ostream& os) const;
00087   int pack(uvm_packer& p) const;
00088   int unpack(uvm_packer& p);
00089   void copy(const uvm_object* rhs);
00090   bool compare(const uvm_object* rhs) const;
00091 
00092   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093   // clone
00094   //
00095   // Creates a clone by doing a create followed by a copy 
00096   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 
00098   uvm_object* clone() const;
00099   
00100   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101   // get_type_name   -- Required override
00102   //
00103   // Return the type name of this class - e.g., "my_object".
00104   // Inherits this pure virtual method from base class uvm_typed.
00105   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106  
00107   virtual std::string get_type_name() const = 0;
00108   
00109   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00110   // do_print  -- Required override
00111   //
00112   // Print the object to a stream
00113   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 
00115   virtual void do_print(std::ostream& os) const = 0;
00116 
00117   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118   // do_pack, do_unpack  -- Required overrides
00119   //
00120   // Pack/unpack the object using an uvm_packer
00121   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 
00123   virtual void do_pack(uvm_packer& p) const = 0;
00124   virtual void do_unpack(uvm_packer& p) = 0;
00125 
00126   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127   // do_copy  -- Required override
00128   //
00129   // Copy the data from another object into this one.
00130   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131  
00132   virtual void do_copy(const uvm_object* rhs) = 0;
00133 
00134   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135   // do_compare  -- Required override
00136   //
00137   // Compare the data of another object with this one. Return true if equal.
00138   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00139 
00140   virtual bool do_compare(const uvm_object* rhs) const = 0;
00141 
00142   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143   // Commands to pack the object to vectors of bool, char, or int.
00144   // Each returns the number of bits in the packed object.
00145   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 
00147   int pack_bits(std::vector<bool>& v, uvm_packer* p = 0);
00148   int pack_bytes(std::vector<char>& v, uvm_packer* p = 0);
00149   int pack_ints(std::vector<int>& v, uvm_packer* p = 0);
00150 
00151   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00152   // Commands to unpack the object from vectors of bool, char, or int.
00153   // Each returns the size of the given vector.
00154   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00155 
00156   int unpack_bits(const std::vector<bool>& v, uvm_packer* p = 0);
00157   int unpack_bytes(const std::vector<char>& v, uvm_packer* p = 0);
00158   int unpack_ints(const std::vector<int>& v, uvm_packer* p = 0);
00159 
00160   friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const uvm_object& obj );
00161   friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const uvm_object* obj );
00162 
00163 protected:
00164 
00165   std::string m_name; // the full name 
00166 };

00169 
00170 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 // Registration macros to register an uvm_object with the factory.
00172 // 
00173 // A registration macro should be invoked outside the uvm_object class
00174 // declaration.
00175 // A registration macro registers the given uvm_object with the factory, and
00176 // defines the get_type_name() member method of the registered object.
00177 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 
00179 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00180 // Use the macro below to register a simple non-templated uvm_object.
00181 // The macro argument is the name of the class.
00182 // The registered name with the factory is the same as the macro argument.
00183 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00184 
00185 #define UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER(t) \
00186 static int uvm_object_register_dummy_##t = \
00187   uvm::uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator( #t,new t::uvm_object_creator_##t()); \
00188 inline std::string t::get_type_name() const { return #t; }
00189 
00190 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00191 // Use the macro below to register a simple non-templated uvm_object, 
00192 // with a different registered name (first argument) than its 
00193 // class name (second argument).
00194 // The registered name with the factory is the same as the first macro argument.
00195 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 
00197 #define UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER_ALIAS(name,t) \
00198 static int uvm_object_register_dummy_##name##_##t UVM_UNUSED_ATTR = \
00199   uvm::uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator( #name,new t::uvm_object_creator_##t()); \
00200 inline std::string t::get_type_name() const { return #name; }
00201 
00202 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00203 // Use the macro below for registering templated uvm_objects with 
00204 // one template parameter.
00205 // The first macro argument is the class name, and the second macro argument
00206 // is a specific value of the template parameter.
00207 // Example usage: "UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER_T(myobj, int)".
00208 // The registered name with the factory is a concatenation of the first
00209 // and second arguments, separated by "_".
00210 // e.g., "myobj_int".
00211 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00212 
00213 #define UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER_T(t,T) \
00214 static int uvm_object_register_dummy_##t##_##T UVM_UNUSED_ATTR = \
00215   uvm::uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator( #t "_" #T, new t<T>::uvm_object_creator_##t()); \
00216 template<> inline std::string t<T>::get_type_name() const { return #t "_" #T; }
00217 
00218 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00219 // Use the macro below for registering templated uvm_objects with 
00220 // one template parameter, when you do not want the default registered name.
00221 // Specify the alternate registration name as the first macro argument.
00222 // Example usage: "UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER_T_ALIAS(myname, myobj, int)".
00223 // The registered name with the factory is the same as the first macro argument.
00224 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225 
00226 #define UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER_T_ALIAS(name,t,T) \
00227 static int uvm_object_register_dummy_##name##_##t UVM_UNUSED_ATTR = \
00228   uvm::uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator( #name, new t<T>::uvm_object_creator_##t()); \
00229 template<> inline std::string t<T>::get_type_name() const { return #name; }
00230 
00231 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00232 // Use the macro below for registering templated uvm_objects with 
00233 // two template parameters.
00234 // The first macro argument is the class name. 
00235 // The second and third macro arguments are specific values of the 
00236 // two template parameters.
00237 // Example usage: "UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER_T2(myotherobj, int, int)".
00238 // The registered name with the factory is a concatenation of the first,
00239 // second, and third arguments, separated by "_". 
00240 // e.g., "myotherobj_int_int".
00241 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00242 
00243 #define UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER_T2(t,T1,T2) \
00244 static int uvm_object_register_dummy_##t##_##T1##_##T2 UVM_UNUSED_ATTR = \
00245   uvm::uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator( #t "_" #T1 "_" #T2, new t<T1,T2>::uvm_object_creator_##t()); \
00246 template<> inline std::string t<T1,T2>::get_type_name() const { return #t "_" #T1 "_" #T2; }
00247 
00248 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00249 // Use the macro below for registering templated uvm_objects with 
00250 // two template parameters, when you do not want the default registered name.
00251 // Specify the alternate registration name as the first macro argument.
00252 // Example usage: "UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER_T2_ALIAS(myname, myotherobj, int, int)".
00253 // The registered name with the factory is the same as the first macro argument.
00254 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255 
00256 #define UVM_OBJECT_REGISTER_T2_ALIAS(name,t,T1,T2) \
00257 static int uvm_object_register_dummy_##name##_##t UVM_UNUSED_ATTR = \
00258   uvm::uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator( #name, new t<T1,T2>::uvm_object_creator_##t()); \
00259 template<> inline std::string t<T1,T2>::get_type_name() const { return #name; }
00260 
00261 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00262 // Utility macro to instrument an uvm_object such that it can be registered
00263 // with the factory.
00264 // 
00265 // The utility macro should be invoked inside the uvm_object class
00266 // declaration.
00267 // The utility macro
00268 // - declares the uvm_object_creator_<classname> class used by the factory
00269 //   to create an instance of this object. 
00270 // - declares the get_type_name() member method inside the uvm_object class.
00271 // - defines the << operator to print the uvm_object to a stream.
00272 // - defines uvm_packer >> operators necessary for unpacking this object.
00273 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00274 
00275 #define UVM_OBJECT_UTILS(t) \
00276 class uvm_object_creator_##t : public uvm::uvm_object_creator { \
00277 public: \
00278   uvm::uvm_object* create(const std::string& name) { \
00279     uvm::uvm_object* _uvmsc_obj = new t(); \
00280     _uvmsc_obj->set_name(name); \
00281     return _uvmsc_obj; \
00282   } \
00283 }; \
00284 virtual std::string get_type_name() const; \
00285 static uvm::uvm_object* create() { return new t(); } \
00286 friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const t& h) { \
00287   h.print(os); \
00288   return os; \
00289 } \
00290 friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const t*& h) { \
00291   h->print(os); \
00292   return os; \
00293 } \
00294 friend uvm::uvm_packer& operator >> (uvm::uvm_packer& p, t*& h) { \
00295   if (p.use_metadata()) { \
00296     uvm::uvm_object* uvmsc_obj; \
00297     p >> uvmsc_obj; \
00298     if (!uvmsc_obj) { \
00299       h = new t(); \
00300       return p; \
00301     } \
00302     h = DCAST<t*>(uvmsc_obj); \
00303     if (!h) {  \
00304       SC_REPORT_ERROR(sc_core::UVM_UNPACK_DCAST_,""); \
00305     } \
00306   } else { \
00307     h = new t(); \
00308     h->unpack(p); \
00309   }   \
00310   return p; \
00311 } \
00312 friend uvm::uvm_packer& operator >> (uvm::uvm_packer& p, t& h) { \
00313   if (p.use_metadata()) { \
00314     t* pt; \
00315     p >> pt; \
00316     h = *pt; \
00317     delete pt; \
00318   } else { \
00319     h.unpack(p); \
00320   } \
00321   return p; \
00322 }
00323 } // namespace uvm
00324 
00325 #endif
